byline.contributor: Bhadra Sharma reported from Kathmandu, and Nida Najar from New Delhi.
byline.original: By BHADRA SHARMA and NIDA NAJAR

abstract: Officials identify bodies of six United States Marines and two Nepali soldiers who died after helicopter bringing relief supplies to earthquake zone crashes.
lead_paragraph: The aircraft, carrying U.S. and Nepalese soldiers, had been delivering relief supplies to villages near the epicenter of a 7.3 magnitude earthquake last week.

headline.main: Bodies Recovered From Helicopter Crash in Nepal Are Identified
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; Nepal: Victims of Helicopter Crash Are Identified

snippet: The aircraft, carrying U.S. and Nepalese soldiers, had been delivering relief supplies to villages near the epicenter of a 7.3 magnitude earthquake last week.
